biography: 36 year-old French PC and consoles developer (Demetrios, Riddled Corpses EX...)- Solo developer of "Demetrios" (Steam, GOG, PS4, PS Vita, Xbox, Switch, Android and iOS)- Ported and improved games from Spanish developer Diabolical Mind (Xenon Valkyrie+, Riddled Corpses EX and Demon's Tier+) on consoleshttps://twitter.com/COWCATGamesI've always been a video game fan and a programmer since childhood! (I've started programming on an Amstrad CPC 6128 computer, which was quite popular in France at the time!)I play all kinds of video games, but my favorites are single player narrative ones such as Point & Clicks, Visual novels, and JRPGs.Although I love 2D / traditional animation, I'm not an artist myself - so this project made me draw and color intensively, which I'm not used to! Hopefully the art isn't too bad, actually I'm glad most people seem to love it despite that :)Currently 100% focused on the development of my new adventure game mixing genres "Brok the InvestiGator"
